Text.val: -- Author: Bujakowski Grzegorz
29.05.2012 JH SCR17269 Added update of new fields FCMH_ADMNO, FCMH_CLNTNO and FCMH_DEBH_NO
22.12.2011 SH SCR16974 Added new CLNA fields
20.12.2011 SH SCR16944 Extended update CLNA_DESCRIPTION for GNRL_CODE='PL'
09.05.2011 JOH SCR16410 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
13.12.2010 SH SCR16028 Added update CLNA_TRANSFERCOSTS/TRANSFERCOMMISSION
and CLNA_PRENOTICEAMOUNT
28.06.2010 GB SCR15619 Changed value of update the CLNA_SETTLEMENTOFCOSTS
06.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
26.03.2009 SH SCR14514 Added CLBA_WAITFORAPPROVAL = N
30.01.2009 SH SCR14353 Part2/step1 Added test --> No automatic advance
08.01.2009 GB SCR14289 Added FCMH_CURRENCY
23.12.2008 GB SCR14263 Removed existing test in Part 2: Prepare advances
if there is already a row in CLNA
11.12.2008 GB SCR14222 Added task Calculate V.TOTFM11 and
Update FI18_BANKCHARGEAMT
02.12.2008 GB SCR14177 Changed value passed on by the parameter PI.TEXT
28.11.2008 SH SCR14166 Removed test on CLNT404_ADVANCECALCULATION and extended
selection in "PrepareAdvances" with FM11_BTPC_DATVALUECLIENT <=
GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATE; Changed update of CLNA_DESCRIPTION
27.11.2008 GB SCR14158 Removed bug (The test on FM11_CLNA_ID = 0 is missing in
1. Calculate advance)
21.11.2008 GB SCR14133 Changed update FCMH_CREATEDBY on "factorlink" and
select clause for Part 2: Prepare advances
Part 4 Report blocked payments to the users
-- for 1. Cheques
-- for 1. Cheques
-- 2. Unallocated payments and not yet assigned invoices

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/BPIV BPIV, :1/PAYC PAYC, :1/INVO INVO where BPIV.BPIV_PAYMENTCODE = PAYC.PAYC_CODE and BPIV.BPIV_INVO_NO = INVO.INVO_NO and BPIV.BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV.BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 and BPIV.BPIV_BTPC_LINENO = :4 and PAYC.PAYC_BLOCKFCIPAYMENT = 'Y' and INVO.INVO_AACTUALI = 0 for fetch only

select FM11.FM11_BTPC_ADMNO, FM11.FM11_BTPC_CLNTNO from :1/FM11 FM11 where FM11_BLOCKADVANCE = 'N' and FM11_CLNA_ID = 0 and FM11_BTPC_DATVALUECLIENT <= ':2' order by FM11.FM11_BTPC_ADMNO, FM11.FM11_BTPC_CLNTNO for fetch only

Text.val: -- Check if automatic advance is possible for the current selected client
... advance amount < min. transfer amount of the client
... only at a specific day of the week advances are allowed for the client
(Info: DOW() represents 1 for sunday, 2 for monday, ...)
3. Deduction of transfer costs

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (FM11_TOTAMTPAID) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/FM11 where FM11_BTPC_ADMNO = :2 and FM11_BTPC_CLNTNO = :3 and FM11_BLOCKADVANCE = 'N' and FM11_CLNA_ID = 0 and FM11_BTPC_DATVALUECLIENT <= ':4' for fetch only

Text.val: ... calculate costs

SQL_STMT_U.val: select FM11.FM11_BTPC_ADMNO, FM11.FM11_BTPC_CLNTNO, FM11.FM11_CLNA_ID from :1/FM11 FM11, :1/CLNA CLNA where FM11.FM11_CLNA_ID = CLNA.CLNA_ID and CLNA.CLNA_TRANSFERRED = 'Y' and FM11.FM11_FM18_NO = 0 and FM11.FM11_CLNA_ID > 0 order by FM11.FM11_BTPC_ADMNO, FM11.FM11_BTPC_CLNTNO, FM11.FM11_CLNA_ID for fetch only
select cast (sum (FI18_PMTAMT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/FI18 where FI18_FM18_NO = :2 for fetch only
